short_summary: Reconstruction du mur roundhead nord - Canal de Canso, Nouvelle-":
description: -Public Services and Procurement Canada (PSPC) has a requirement for North Roundhead Reconstruction at the Canso Canal in Nova Scotia. The scope of work for this project consists of the furnishing of all plant, labour, equipment and material required to complete the work. In general, the work under this contract will consist of, but will not necessarily be limited to :
